text.tspan: Share of urban vs. rural population using safely managed sanitation facilities,
Share of the urban versus population using a safely managed sanitation service; that is, excreta safely disposed of in situ or
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP)
